name: less-themes-webpack-plugin
description: A webpack plugin for generating multiple themed css files from less.

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "Increment patch version to %s"
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "Increment minor version to %s"
scripts.major: npm version major -m "Increment major version to %s"

author: Darren Paul Wright <Darren@DarrenPaulWright.com>
